title: Close to Shopping, Dining, And ACC!
posting_body: Find your home in North Central Austin!

At this community, you will be close to Whole Foods Market, HEB, and Target, and near upscale shopping and entertainment at The Domain where you'll find over 100 stores and restaurants such as Neiman Marcus, Anthropologie, Macy's, and The Apple Store!
Enjoy close proximity to Austin's high-tech hub where you'll find IBM, Abbott Labs, Dell Computers, 3M, and TI!
Easy access to the Texas Hill Country or Downtown Austin via Loop 1 (Mopac), Highway 183, and I-35 -- all located within close proximity!
Private Dining Room with Beveled Mirrors
Laundry Room with Full-Size Washer/Dryer Connections
Limited Access Entry Gates with Remote
Fitness Center with Complimentary Towel & Water Service
Picnic Pavilion with Gas Fire Pit
2013 Apartment Ratings Top Rated Award Recipient
Call today to schedule your showing!
Matt Davidson ~over 28 years of leasing experience in Austin~
I have access to over 1000 listings, and can help you with all your renting needs!
FREE SERVICE TO YOU, NO FEES!
